p:
Coronaviruses (CoVs) are enveloped positive-stranded RNA viruses. They belong to the order of Nidovirales and are classified into four genera: α, β, γ, and δ.
1 Coronaviruses are animal viruses with circulating reservoirs in mammals and birds. For most coronaviruses, the lifecycle can be dissected into four steps, including viral entry, replication, assembly, and release.
2
